nodes.text: Star Wars: 10-Button Sounds: Villains is a sound book which features Darth Sidious, Maul, Jango Fett, Grievous and other characters. It was written by Benjamin Harper and published by Studio Fun International on October 1, 2019.
A must-have sound book for every young Padawan learning about Star Wars for the first time or longtime fans of all ages!

This 10-button sound book contains cool lightsaber battle sounds, classic quotes, and more from this fan-favorite franchise. This sturdy board book will entertain young children for hours as they learn about the dark side of a galaxy far, far away...
